attributes.action: make the number of years of National Insurance contributions required for women to get a full pension 30 years for eveyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently new rules in place mean that from 6 April 2010 women only need 30 years worth of NI contributions to get a full state penson.  Any women due to receive a pension before this date need 39 years worth of NI contributions. Some may miss out on a full pension by one day.  How can this nine year gap be fair?  The cost of allowing all women a full state pension with 30 years worth of contributions is a drop in the ocean compared to government spending else where.
